summary:
Business professional with background in operations, business development and sales from several different industries: online, hospitality, FMCG and sporting goods.
Experience operating in multiple markets, managing teams and stakeholders, identifying opportunities, improving process gaps and working together with the product and commercial teams.

courses.name: The Complete Project Management Fundamentals Course

profile_positions.description:
To attend the growth needs of the department and after successfully creating the new structure within the Operations team I now "manage the managers", being responsible for the two teams.

As the Manager Operations my responsibility is to drive initiatives to increase operational efficiency and effectiveness with the objective of supporting growth through scalable processes and tools. Those initiatives lead the Operations team in supporting the operational activities on a variety of business functions within Attractions vertical.

The Operations team's functions:
- Own end to end content creation and quality checks in product creation process and maintenance
- Execute Supply Management workstream
- Oversee execution of various business operations functions
- Oversee integration with Customer Service from Attractions business side
profile_positions.title: Manager Operations (Attractions, Trips Business Unit)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing operational processes and managing performance of both the internal team as well as the various stakeholders on which the team is dependent for product creation (Internal Content Agency, Attractions Product Team, 3rd Party Partners, Customer Service). 
Managed a team of 16 people.

Successes:
- Hired and organized completely new team which after the initial set up I managed to transform into highly functioning team. Growing 4 Coordinators into Junior Opex Specialists and 2 Opex Specialists into team leaders adding 2 new role levels in the existing set up.
- Scaled product processing 20x in 3 months with no impact on quality
- Close collaboration with Content Agency to develop new staffing model and way of work to support >10x growth in Attractions content needs
- Close collaboration with external 3rd party supply partners to create processes for fixing and preventing content quality problems (including shared guidelines, checklists, partner workshops, detailed tracking)
profile_positions.title: Operations Support Manager (Attractions, Trips Business Unit)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for creating new supply and supporting Attractions direct partners. Worked together with the commercial team in the local markets on executing commercial targets.  
Defined objectives, KPIs and workflows of collaborations with the Commercial team and the Customer Service.
Collaborated with the product team on improving Attractions platform, internal tools and processes.
Managed a global team consisting of 16 Account Executives located in all world’s regions.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Operations Support Team Lead (Attractions Business Unit)

profile_positions.description:
Managed the team of 15 Acquisition&Onboarding Executives - based in Rome and Zagreb, covering 9 different languages in the SEMEA Commercial Outbound Hub.
Established efficient processes to manage the local and remote Executives, making sure the team is engaged and partner-focused, including successfully managing changes in processes and KPIs.
Team's task was to support acquisition and onboarding of the new accommodation partners and giving sales advice to existing partners on how to achieve better performance. 
Region of operation: South-East Europe, Middle East and Africa.
profile_positions.title: Partner Acquisition & Onboarding Team Lead (SE Europe & MEA, Partner Services)

profile_positions.description:
Created local implementation strategies for growing partner base portfolio for BookingSuite SaaS solutions in the Balkan region (10 countries) and the Middle East region (GCC).
Engaging local Booking.com teams in gaining knowledge and expertise about the BookingSuite hospitality digital solutions and ensuring target achievements.
Supported Booking.com Local Commercial Teams to introduce BookingSuite during local events with Partners such as tourism trade fairs, workshops and social events.
Gathering and sharing market knowledge and feedback from the  local markets and partners with Amsterdam HQ Product Teams to improve BookingSuite service, products and business processes.
profile_positions.title: Digital Solutions Business Developer (Balkans and Middle East, SaaS solutions)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for hotel account management, maintaining and expanding relationships with business partners. Consulting business partners regarding marketing and promotional activities. 
Supporting Booking.com BV’s acquisition of new hotels in a specific area in Croatia. 
Creating strategic plans to improve daily business. Delivering quantitative and qualitative market reports.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager Hotels (Croatia, Partner Services)

profile_positions.description:
Localization and production of all teaching and home-use materials. 
Organizing a country-wide network of instructors. Introducing the Baby Signs Program into kindergartens throughout Croatia.
Coordinating program's expansion to neighboring countries of Slovenia, Serbia and Bosnia & Herzegovina.
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Managing brand Fa by ensuring effective cooperation with local sales forces and local demand.
Developing and implementing marketing plans, strategies, budgets, materials and promotional activities for Adria region (Croatia, Slovenia, Bosnia, Macedonia, Kosovo and Montenegro).
Delivering market research and analysis.
Product market positioning and launch of new products together with planning promotional campaigns and ensuring support for sales forces to monitor market trends and improve market knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Brand manager

profile_positions.description:
Monitoring and analyzing market trends and studying competitors' products and services. Identifying target markets and developing strategies to communicate with them by preparing and managing marketing plans and budgets.
Managing production of promotional materials and maintaining and expanding a network of endorsed individuals and teams.
Taking part at sales conferences.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager - Reebok brand

volunteer_experiences.description: Representing Europe as a member of Executive Board of International Softball Federation, world's governing body for the sport of softball.

Representing Croatian Softball Association at all levels. Ensuring and controlling the regularity of the procedures and acts with respect to the Statutes and Regulations. 
Executing financial plan and directly cooperating with Croatian Olympic Committee.
Responsible for Association's public work and transparency.
